title: X509Enrollment Certificate Support
body: We used to be able to utilize ActiveX and certenroll.dll to enroll certificates.  ActiveX no longer works for Edge. We need a way to request certificates via Microsoft Edge.

comments.body:
The Microsoft Edge browser and web enrollment pages
The new Edge browser that is introduced with Windows 10 does not support ActiveX controls, which means that you cannot use this browser for web enrollment. Instead, you can add the web enrollment pages website to the Enterprise Mode Site List. This setting automatically opens the web enrollment pages in Internet Explorer 11.
For more information, see the following blog post by the Microsoft Edge Team: How Microsoft Edge and Internet Explorer 11 on Windows 10 work better together in the Enterprise.
http://blogs.windows.com/msedgedev/2015/08/26/how-microsoft-edge-and-internet-explorer-11-on-windows-10-work-better-together-in-the-enterprise/
